topicSummary: Deep vein thrombosis (DVT) can occur as a result of long distance travel. The risk of travel-related DVT in healthy people is extremely low

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: DVT prevention for travellers: Summary

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in July 2018 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key RCTs published since the last revision of this topic. No significant changes to clinical recommendations have been made.
